men <WG444> fainting<WG674> for<WG575> fear<WG5401>, and<WG2532> for<WG575> expectation<WG4329> of the things<WG3588> which are coming on<WG1904> the world<WG1063>: for the powers<WG1411> of the heavens<WG3772> shall be shaken<WG4531>.
